alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dona Ana and northwestern El Paso Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary 9 miles southeast of Afton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anthony, Berino, Chamberino, La Union and Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 157 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
